Package Characters

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Characters.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Character
Class for the Enemy, which will chase the player when the player in view range or move randomly when far from the player. But has half speed of the player
Author:
Yuwen Jia

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(int viewRange, int speedX, int speedY, Image texture, Point location, GamePanel map)
      Creates an Enemy with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      location - a point where Character is located
      texture - an Image that represents the Character
      speedX - speed on the x-axis
      speedY - speed on the y-axis
      map - game panel that the Character belongs
      viewRange - the range that this Enemy can view

  • Method Details

    • getDistance

      public int getDistance(Player p)
      Calculate the distance between the enemy and player.
      Parameters:
      p - Player object that this Enemy is chasing
      Returns:
      this Enemy's distance towards the Player

    • chase

      public void chase(Player p)
      The method which determine model of enemy's movement, and ensure the enemy will not be stuck.
      Parameters:
      p - The Player that this Enemy is chasing
